documentation.text: @dev corresponds to the burn rate of DSLA tokens, but divided by 1000 i.e burn percentage = DSLAburnRate/1000 %
@dev array with the allowed tokens addresses of the StakeRegistry

@dev add a token to ve allowed for staking
@param _tokenAddress 1. address of the new allowed token

attributes.text: @dev corresponds to the burn rate of DSLA tokens, but divided by 1000 i.e burn percentage = DSLAburnRate/1000 %
@dev array with the allowed tokens addresses of the StakeRegistry

@dev add a token to ve allowed for staking
@param _tokenAddress 1. address of the new allowed token

devdoc.details: StakeRegistry is a contract to register the staking activity of the platform, along with controlling certain admin privileged parameters

StakingParametersModified(uint256,uint25.details: event to log modifications on the staking parameters

params.DSLAburnRate: 1. (DSLAburnRate/1000)% of DSLA to be burned after a reward/compensation is paid
params.minimumDSLAStakedTier1: 2. minimum stake of DSLA to enable tier 1 privileges
params.minimumDSLAStakedTier2: 3. minimum stake of DSLA to enable tier 2 privileges
params.minimumDSLAStakedTier3: 4. minimum stake of DSLA to enable tier 3 privileges

addAllowedTokens(address).details: add a token to ve allowed for staking

params._tokenAddress: 1. address of the new allowed token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_DSLAburnRate.details: corresponds to the burn rate of DSLA tokens, but divided by 1000 i.e burn percentage = DSLAburnRate/1000 %

allowedTokens.details: array with the allowed tokens addresses of the StakeRegistry

devdoc.title: StakeRegistry
